name: Alchemistress Vivi​
description:
A black magic temple on the edge of a deadly swamp. Protected by unholy beings and magical illusions, this place holds numerous traps and dangers for visitors. Vivien, a witch coming from the kingdom of Traventor, however, has made the firm decision to enter this place. She is looking for something here and she won't leave until she finally holds it in her hands. Will you help Vivi reach her goal?

Alchemistress Vivi is a code-breaking logic puzzle that should take approximately 20 to 25 minutes to complete. In each level, up to 6 magic items must be arranged in a certain order to cast powerful spells. Every try results in a feedback that helps the player to eventually find the right sequence. But watch out: There's only a limited number of lives available for this.

This game supports two languages (German and English).
